definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Middle rate is the arithmetic average rate of buying rate and selling rate, used for inter-bank.
sentences.chinese: 中間匯率是買入匯率和賣出匯率的算術平均數。

sentences.english: Also, observe the average number of connections created and destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 同時，觀察已創建和已毀壞連接的平均數。

sentences.english: An average obtained by adding together the individual numbers concerned and dividing the total by their number.
sentences.chinese: 即簡單平均數，等於所有數值之和除以數值的項數。

sentences.english: In this paper, a simple rule for the harmonic mean and the arithmetic mean was given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了應用調和平均數與算術平均數的簡單規則。

sentences.english: In this paper, a simple rule for the harmonic mean and the arithmetic mean was given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了應用調和平均數與算術平均數的簡單規則。

sentences.english: The average number of active threads is a gauge for the number of concurrent requests reaching the container.
sentences.chinese: 活動線程的平均數是到達容器的當前請求數的標準。

sentences.english: The weights of the internals organs at 5 weeks old were over the average of the feeding term.
sentences.chinese: 約在5周齡時內臟器官重超過飼養階段的平均數。

sentences.english: Worked out the principle and method according to Laspeyres average form in consumer price index.
sentences.chinese: 消費價格指數按拉氏平均數形式編制的原理與方法。

sentences.english: Unweighted indices are simple arithmetic or geometric averages.
sentences.chinese: 不加權的指數指簡單算術平均或幾何平均數。

sentences.english: It is the law or averages.
The number of women who buy Ferraris in China is double the global average.
sentences.chinese: 而在中國，法拉利的女性買家更是全球平均數的2倍。

sentences.english: In this paper, the properties of the mean number of optical phonons of the polaron in a polyatomic crystals are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究多原子晶體中極化子光學聲子平均數的性質。

sentences.english: Simple average, equal to the sum of alls divided by the total number of s.
sentences.chinese: 即簡單平均數，等於所有數值之和除以數值的項數。

sentences.english: Then you take the average of g and x over g.
sentences.chinese: 之後你會得到一個大於g的平均數。

definition: sum or volume of business transactions/turnover
(computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
sum (result of addition)/addition/total/to add up a number of items/to accumulate
